ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Masters] your feelings on recent changes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... When they do, make sure they use a spellchecker. Otherwise, they don t just sound like loonies. They sound like ignorant loonies. --Jekke -- We have gone
ygData.messageBody:
> DUe to the frequent changes sony/varent has induced into this game
> such as revamping some perfectly fine zones and make them harder than
> orginaly, and swiping c3 and even c2 from our collective grasp, my
> famley members who play this game will be writing sony and they will
> shortly and most likely be quiting this game

When they do, make sure they use a spellchecker. Otherwise, they don't just
sound like loonies. They sound like ignorant loonies.

--Jekke
--
"We have gone forth from our shores repeatedly over the last hundred
years...and put wonderful young men and women at risk, many of whom have
lost their lives, and we have asked for nothing except enough ground
to bury them in."
--Colin Powell
